input.sentences: this morning i got to see a family of ducks when i was going on my walk .
the mommy duck was watching over the babies .
the mallard had beautiful green feathers .
after stopping to look at the ducks i finished my walk .
output.sentences: Daddy Duck and Mommy Duck decided a walk in the morning was good for the family.
As the ducks walked along, the baby decided to cross the street.
"Make sure to be watching both ways!" said Mommy Duck and the children crosses the street.
Daddy Duck, a mallard with bright green feathers, stayed in front of the children, using his head as a beacon.
They began to walk across, stopping to wait until the humans finished crossing.
